line_1: And gain a kick for aukward flattery.
line_2: These arts in vain our rugged natives try,

line_1: And gain a kick for aukward flattery.
line_2: Strain out with fault'ring diffidence a lye,

line_1: More us'd to Satyr than to Flattery:
line_2: To the few Patrons of true Sense I fly,

line_1: More us'd to Satyr than to Flattery:
line_2: And beg a Genius at their Feet may lye,
